content.heroIntro: Welcome to ALMURIA HILLS, an exclusive residential development by AMBAR INMO GROUP, nestled in the heart of Urbanizacion La Almunias, San Miguel de Salinas. This prestigious project showcases meticulously designed Villas, Penthouses, and Town Houses with 2-3 bedrooms, offering the perfect blend of modern living and Mediterranean charm. Starting from just €423,500, ALMURIA HILLS represents exceptional value in Costa Blanca's booming real estate market—40% more affordable than Spanish island markets while delivering superior quality and lifestyle amenities. Each property features premium finishes, private parking, landscaped gardens, and optional swimming pool access. With completion scheduled for December 1st, 2026, AMBAR INMO GROUP guarantees a 10-year structural warranty on all homes. Whether you're seeking a holiday retreat, investment property, or permanent residence, ALMURIA HILLS combines strategic location accessibility with world-class amenities within minutes: beautiful Blue Flag beaches, championship golf courses, international schools, and modern shopping centers. The established international community speaks English fluently, making integration seamless for foreign buyers.

The region combines authentic Spanish charm with modern conveniences, featuring excellent healthcare facilities including a regional hospital just 30 minutes away, alongside private clinics and English-speaking doctors. Educational options include international schools with British curriculum programs, perfect for families. Multiple Blue Flag beaches are within 20-minute reach, offering pristine Mediterranean coastlines for relaxation and recreation. Several championship golf courses nearby cater to enthusiasts, while renowned shopping centers and local markets provide comprehensive amenities. The area's consistent 8% year-on-year property appreciation reflects strong market confidence and makes it an attractive investment destination.

faqs.question: Can foreigners buy property in San Miguel de Salinas?
faqs.answer: Yes, foreigners can freely purchase property in Spain and San Miguel de Salinas. Non-residents require a Spanish tax identification number (NIE), but the purchase process is straightforward. Many properties in the area are owned by international buyers. We recommend consulting with a Spanish lawyer to guide you through the legal requirements.

faqs.question: What are the costs of buying property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Beyond the property price, typical costs include: transfer tax (6-10%), notary fees (0.5-1%), land registry fees (0.1-0.5%), and potentially real estate agent fees (3-5% if using an agent). For ALMURIA HILLS at €423,500, plan for approximately €45,000-55,000 in additional costs. We recommend consulting with a tax advisor for precise calculations.
